descriptionHtml:
Scale-Kin\'s Skyrim Overhaul
Version 0.2

This mod aims to overhaul Skyrim by providing more of a challenge, realism and things that should have been there in the first place!
This version is untested and thus awaiting your feedback!

Current Features:
Potions and food will heal, or provide their effects over time (usually a dew seconds), poisons will also do this, this should prevent spamming foods and potions.
Alcohol slows magicka regeneration!
Improved AI:
I focused more on dragons, but wolves should now act more like pack animals and be less aggressive, many other creatures and NPCs are improved!
Argonians now do claw damage, swim faster and they can also do combat while swimming!
The racial skill of restoration has been replaced by alchemy, as it seems more logical with a swamp full of poisons!
Argonians now have a few more skin colours!
Better melee combat (WIP)
Combat will be deadly in future, for now melee attacks and shield bashing are closer!
More powerful traps (less delay, higher fire-rates, generally script-based atm)
Thankyou for at least considering to try my mod!
Suggestions and welcome and I appreciate feedback!

Changelog:
0.2
Fixed bugs, removed supposed \"ragdoll collisionm which didn\'t work.
Added trap tweaks and tweaked races.
Argonians now have a few more skin colours!
author: ScaleKin
